00003 #include "evn.h"

00017 #include <openssl/asn1.h>

00019 #include <time.h>
00020 
00021 using namespace std;
00022 
00023 long isCertValid ();
00024 
00025 int main(int ac, char* av[]) {
00026 
00027         // create service
00028         FileTransferSoapBindingProxy service;
00029 
00030         try {
00031         SubmitTransferCli cli;
00032         cli.initCli(ac, av);
00033 
00034         string source = cli.getSource(), destination = cli.getDestination(), endpoint = cli.getService();
00035                 // set endpoint
00036                 if (endpoint.size() == 0) {
00037                         cout << "Failed to determine the endpoint" << endl;
00038                         return 0;
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 service.soap_endpoint = endpoint.c_str();       // https://vtb-generic-32.cern.ch:8443/glite-data-transfer-fts/services/FileTransfer
00042 
00043                 // init
00044                 soap_cgsi_init(&service,  CGSI_OPT_DISABLE_NAME_CHECK | CGSI_OPT_SSL_COMPATIBLE);
00045                 soap_set_namespaces(&service, fts_namespaces);
00046 
00047                 fts__getInterfaceVersionResponse ivresp;
00048                 service.getInterfaceVersion(ivresp);
00049                 string interface = ivresp.getInterfaceVersionReturn;
00050 
00051                 CliManager::getInstance()->setInterface(interface);
00052 
00053         if(!cli.performChecks()) return 0;
00054 
00055                 if (cli.printHelp() || cli.printVersion()) return 0;
00056 
00057                 // produce output
00058                 if (cli.isVerbose()) {
00059                         cout << "# Using endpoint" << service.soap_endpoint << endl;
00060 
00061                         fts__getVersionResponse version;
00062                         service.getVersion(version);
00063                         cout << "# Service version: " << version.getVersionReturn << endl;
00064 
00065                         fts__getInterfaceVersionResponse interface;
00066                         service.getInterfaceVersion(interface);
00067                         cout << "# Interface version: " << interface.getInterfaceVersionReturn << endl;
00068 
00069                         fts__getSchemaVersionResponse schema;
00070                         service.getSchemaVersion(schema);
00071                         cout << "# Schema version: " << schema.getSchemaVersionReturn << endl;
00072 
00073                         fts__getServiceMetadataResponse metadata;
00074                         service.getServiceMetadata("feature.string", metadata);
00075                         cout << "# Service features: " << metadata._getServiceMetadataReturn << endl;
00076                 }
00077                 // Job
00078                 transfer__TransferJob job;
00079 
00080                 // JobElement
00081                 transfer__TransferJobElement element;
00082                 element.source = soap_new_std__string(&service, -1);
00083                 element.dest = soap_new_std__string(&service, -1);
00084 
00085                 *(element.source) = source;//"srm://lxbra1910.cern.ch:8446/srm/managerv2?SFN=/dpm/cern.ch/home/dteam/file.out";
00086                 *(element.dest) = destination;//"srm://galway.desy.de:8443/srm/managerv2?SFN=/pnfs/desy.de/data/dteam/file.out.overwrite";
00087 
00088                 job.transferJobElements.push_back(&element);
00089 
00090                 // Params
00091                 job.jobParams = cli.getParams(&service);
00092 /*
00093                 job.jobParams = soap_new_transfer__TransferParams(&service, -1);
00094                 job.jobParams->keys.push_back("overwrite");
00095                 job.jobParams->values.push_back("Y");
00096 */
00097                 // transfer submit
00098                 fts__transferSubmit2Response resp;
00099                 int ret = service.transferSubmit2(&job, resp);
00100 
00101                 // resp
00102                 cout << "ret: " << ret << endl;
00103                 cout << "resp: " << resp._transferSubmit2Return << endl;
00104     }
00105     catch(exception& e) {
00106         cerr << "error: " << e.what() << "\n";
00107         return 1;
00108     }
00109     catch(...) {
00110         cerr << "Exception of unknown type!\n";
00111     }
00112 
00113     return 0;
00114 }
00115 
00116 long isCertValid () {
00117         string serviceLocation = "https://vtb-generic-32.cern.ch:8443/glite-data-transfer-fts/services/gridsite-delegation";
00118 
00119     char * user_proxy = GRSTx509FindProxyFileName();
00120         FILE *fp = fopen(user_proxy , "r");
00121     X509 *cert = PEM_read_X509(fp, 0, 0, 0);
00122     fclose(fp);
00123     char* c_str = (char*) ASN1_STRING_data(X509_get_notAfter(cert));
00124     long time = GRSTasn1TimeToTimeT(c_str, 0) - ::time(0);
00125 
00126     cout << "Remaining time for local proxy is " << time / 3600 << " hours and " << time % 3600 / 60 << " minutes." << endl;
00127 
00128     return time;
00129 }
